remarks: Part 15 of [Baer] p. 50 line 6.  Also line 15 in [Holland95] p. 14. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapvs.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapvs.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapvs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hgmapvs.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hgmapvs.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapvs.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapvs.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapvs.e $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
hgmapvs.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapvs.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapvs.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapvs.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hgmapvs.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hgmapvs $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` ( F .x. X ) ) = ( ( G ` F ) .xb ( S ` X ) ) ) $.
